availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elizabeth Akers Wilson (Wayne Co, VA / WV farmer)

body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer. Wayne County, Virginia, native. Daughter of John Frasher and Mary Frasher. Married to John Akers. Mother of James W. Wilson, Lewis F. Wilson, Mary Jane Wilson, Burwell Wilson, John F. Wilson, Nathaniel Wilson, and Noah Wilson. Married to James P. Wilson in Wayne County, Virginia, on September 29, 1860. Resident of Wayne County in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
